document.full_text: while politicians, scientists and activists are calling for a planned nuclear project to be scrapped, indian energy officials say the country cannot hope to meet its energy needs without nuclear power being a major part of the mix.
document.title: for energy-starved india, japan's crisis raises hard questions
lines_and_colors: while politicians, scientists and activists are calling for a planned nuclear project to be scrapped, indian energy officials say the country cannot hope to meet its energy needs without nuclear power being a major part of the mix.
